Reviews.Title: nice camera - but dont expect great pictures
Reviews.Author: Jo
Reviews.Content: This camera was cheap and is handy and of light weight - and I am happy to have it for my handbag without having to bother to scratch it or so.If conditions are nice (blue sky, good light source) the pictures are pretty good - but DONT EXPECT MORE. Especially in low light situations the pictures often blur or are just black or really dark.Buy it as an extra camera, but have a better one for important situations.

Reviews.Title: ~Worth EVERY Dollar~
Reviews.Author: gauge_2008
Reviews.Content: This is a light weight camera with a nice zoom. It was inexpensive for a 14.1 MP. It takes great pictures and the "Image Stabilazation" really isnt just hype. I love it.

Reviews.Title: Casio
Reviews.Author: mom of ky&keg; "jen d"
Reviews.Content: This is a great camera. I have always used casio brands. This is not as slim as my other casio, but compared to a regular camera it is slimmer. This camera is easy to use. has great functions and options. Takes great photos. I would highly recommend this product to others..

Reviews.Title: Casio Camera EX-Z550 Refurbished
Reviews.Author: Hector Enamorado
Reviews.Content: The product was delivered as promised and so far is working fine. All accessories promised where in the box,  but since it's a refurbished item I will not know for sure if it will continue to work until after a few months. So far no complaints. I'm giving the seller the benefit of the doubt.

Reviews.Title: casio camera
Reviews.Author: william barrios
Reviews.Content: all ok good excellent care is a reliable product and recommend it 100% sure I've used it and really work great thank you very much for your attention

Reviews.Title: not as expected
Reviews.Author: T S "T"
Reviews.Content: Love the ease of the menu of all Casio point and shoots, but picture quality is 'eh'..edges of pictures are blurry, photo quality is not clear, and HD video is not good....my 5mp Casio shoots better photo's.  Save your money and upgrade to a better quality Casio or go to the Canon Elph series.

Reviews.Title: Very good
Reviews.Author: Ledif Alberto Morales del Castillo
Reviews.Content: Excellent, I am very happy with these purchases...!  Thanks to all great service! continue so... isn't there any gift?  XD

Reviews.Title: best
Reviews.Author: Yenny Paiva
Reviews.Content: reliable quick simple and effective, I have no complaint of this House and the finish is very, very nice :)

Reviews.Title: excellent
Reviews.Author: Migcar
Reviews.Content: Good product, arrived on the date indicated. Recommended 100%. excellent product. . . . . . . . . .

Reviews.Title: excellent item for the price
Reviews.Author: Luis
Reviews.Content: I bought it as a present for a 15 years old girl and she love it. It is very easy to use and she not have any complaints about the use of it.

Reviews.Title: Casio Ex-Z550 14.1 MP Camera
Reviews.Author: Princess Anna
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera April 20, 2011. I've tested it out for over a year now...well lets start by saying this camera is ok. Nothing great! I had high hopes for this camera... I bought the pink one because I am a girly girl and absolutely love pink! The color & build of this camera is good. Design wise it is awesome. The camera is sturdy, construction is good, I have dropped this camera 2-3 times on accident and everything seems just fine. Lightweight, easy to travel with.Pictures are nothing special. Don't expect anything great, blurry and grainy low light pictures. Oh and low light, by that I mean any lighting after like 3pm, its practically too dark to take pics. Especially indoors. When I use the timer to snap pics, the last 2 pics always come out blurry. Extremely frustrating.This is a good everyday, just snapping pictures of my life to go on FB camera. I find that it is just not good enough for blogging and selling items online. Which is what I purchased this camera for. Its not the worst camera in the world, but its not the best either, so I am back on the hunt for a better digital camera.

Reviews.Title: The girlfriend loved it
Reviews.Author: Me
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera when it was a gold box hot deal for $49 as a stocking stuffer for my girlfriend. She loves the camera. It is easy to use and takes great pictures. She had it opened and taking superb pictures as soon as the battery was charged. I have found Casio cameras to be very good in general and this one did not disappoint.

Reviews.Title: great camera
Reviews.Author: A. Paci
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my 6 year old daughter for Christmas. She loves it and it takes great photos. I got this during a lightening deal. Excellent price!

Reviews.Title: Great Basic Camera at a Awesome Price
Reviews.Author: Asuka-kun
Reviews.Content: Update:I have now had my camera for a few weeks and brought it with me on a trip to Brazil. I used to not be a big picture taker but now I don't go anywhere without it. The battery life is wonderful. I take hundreds of pictures and turn it on and off all day without any problem. I am only on the second charge and I have been using it every day for weeks. I recommend using the advanced mode where it auto-edits your pictures for color contrast and shakiness. I am not a good picture taker but this advanced setting makes my pictures look fantastic because it automatically senses what type of photo you are taking and then adjusts accordingly. Supposedly this drains batter but I have kept it on this setting consistently and, as I said before, that battery life is incredible. The only draw back to this setting is that it takes a moment to adjust the picture after you take it so you cannot take photos rapidly. Make sure it is on the regular setting if you need to take a quick series.---I just received my camera in the mail this evening and have not had a long time to play with it but my initial reactions are very positive. I have been loooking for a camera to replace my 8 year old canon but I am not a big picture taker (maybe a result of how slow and clunky my old camera is) so I did not want to shell out a lot of money on something I wouldn't use much. This little Casio fits the bill. It takes decent pictures and 14.1 Mp is really generous for the price. It is definitely just made for general use so you can't expect it to compete with fancier models. For those occasional picture takers it is a great thing to have around.I happened to snag it during the flash sale on Amazon which only made it $49.99 for me which may bias me a bit because I feel like I stole it but I think under $100 is more than reasonable for a name brand 14 Mp digital.

Reviews.Title: Simple and awesome
Reviews.Author: Eka Aditya
Reviews.Content: This camera really good looking. I'll give this camera as a gift for my sister. Easy to use, nice quality picture, fit on your pocket, and good features.

Reviews.Title: great for a child
Reviews.Author: fredb
Reviews.Content: bought it for my daughter, she loves it, the picture quality is good,  ease of use, bottom line if she likes it that's all that matters.

Reviews.Title: very good,so many different photo modus
Reviews.Author: Sarah
Reviews.Content: Very good Product,i would buy it again =)i love casio exilm my old camera were 7 years old and ony a little thing get broken

Reviews.Title: Defective Even After Replacement
Reviews.Author: Disappointed
Reviews.Content: The camera first came with defect, after power on for a couple of minutes, unable to focus, no matter how many times you depress the shutter button to the 1st detent for focus, the center red box on the screen would not turn green which indicated the desired frame is being focus and ready for snap at 2nd detent of the shutter button. You will need to keep power off and on again to get it back to normal for another few minutes. Returned it for a replacement, however, replacement came with similar defect again. Even with full refund which will take a while, will lost on the exchg rate as I purchased with non-US credit card. Wonder how Amazon will do for service recovery..... ???

Reviews.Title: Good for the money
Reviews.Author: Tay Arreaza Ch
Reviews.Content: I don't really like this camera, i thougth that could be good, cheap but good, but i realize that doesn't exist a camera with that two benefits, if you want a good camera (not professional, but good) you have too spend at least 250$, if you want to give it as a present to a child or your kid this works.
